name: agentic-web-foundation
description: AWS tools to create agentic web foundation network

scripts.up: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-web-foundation-staging --parameter-overrides EmptyDeploymentBucketOnDelete=true Stage=staging --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.up:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file foundation.yaml --stack-name agentic-web-foundation --parameter-overrides Stage=prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-web-foundation-staging --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
scripts.status:prod: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name agentic-web-foundation --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text 2>/dev/null || echo 'STACK_DELETED'
